articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction as West Ham record a significant win at Newcastle in the Premier League.
articles.title: Football latest: West Ham ease pressure with win at Newcastle plus Salah contract debate

articles.description: Mohamed Salah is "selfish" for publicly expressing his disappointment at Liverpool's failure to offer him a new contract, says former Reds defender Jamie Carragher.
articles.title: Mohamed Salah contract: Jamie Carragher says Liverpool forward 'selfish' for comments

articles.description: Joe Root says Darren Lehmann is "entitled to say what he wants" after the former Australia coach claimed England's leading runscorer is a "rung below" the all-time greats.
articles.title: Joe Root on Darren Lehmann comments: 'I'll do my job, he can do his'

articles.description: Zambia and Orlando Pride forward Barbra Banda is voted BBC Women's Footballer of the Year.
articles.title: Barbra Banda wins BBC Women's Footballer of the Year award

articles.description: How Australia cricket is still affected - and will continue to be so - by the death of Phillip Hughes 10 years ago.
articles.title: Phillip Hughes: Australia batter remembered 10 years on

articles.description: Viktor Gyokeres is on target to break Lionel Messi's record-breaking goalscoring season. But can he do it?
articles.title: Viktor Gyokeres: Can Sporting striker match Lionel Messi's record goal-scoring season?

articles.description: Quarterback Lamar Jackson stars as Baltimore Ravens seal a 30-23 victory against the Los Angeles Chargers in the latest edition of the 'Harbaugh Bowl'.
articles.title: Los Angeles Chargers 23-30 Baltimore Ravens: Lamar Jackson leads Ravens to victory

articles.description: BBC Sport's Nedum Onuoha travels to Italy to sample a classic Milanese dinner with AC Milan striker Tammy Abraham while catching up on what life has been like for the forward playing in Italy since his move from Chelsea.
articles.title: Away Goals: AC Milan's Tammy Abraham on life and playing in Italy

articles.description: London-born OG Anunoby scores a career-high 40 points as the New York Knicks beat the Denver Nuggets 145-118.
articles.title: NBA: OG Anunoby helps New York Knicks beat Denver Nuggets

articles.description: BBC F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions following Max Verstappen's world title win at the Las Vegas Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Max Verstappen, Lewis Hamilton, Mercedes, Lando Norris, McLaren
